```py
>>> with raises(ZeroDivisionError):
...     n = 1/0    # will execute and raise, aborting the ``with``
...     n = 9999/0 # never executed
```

```py
>>> with raises(ZeroDivisionError):
...     n = 1/0    # will execute and raise
>>> with raises(ZeroDivisionError):
...     n = 9999/0 # will also execute and raise 
```
